daysHumanizeDate.label: Humanized date
daysHumanizeDate.description: Up to how many days should the date be displayed humanized? -1 = Deactivated

firstLine.label: First line
firstLine.description: Content of the first line before the note text. The following fields are available as variables: %s

noteLine.label: Note text line
noteLine.description: Content of the note text line. The following fields are available as variables: %s

lastLine.label: Last line
lastLine.description: Content of the last line after the note text. The following fields are available as variables: %s

itemSizeHeight.label: Item height
itemSizeHeight.description: How high the preview in pixels of each note element should be

bodyExcerpt.label: Note excerpt
bodyExcerpt.description: How many characters should be displayed from the note text

cssDateOverwrite.label: Replace CSS styles for the date
cssDateOverwrite.description: Replace the CSS styles for the class %s

cssTagOverwrite.label: Replace CSS styles for the tags
cssTagOverwrite.description: Replace CSS styles for the class %s

cssFirstLineOverwrite.label: Replace CSS styles for the first line
cssFirstLineOverwrite.description: Replace CSS styles for the class %s

cssLastLineOverwrite.label: Replace CSS styles for the last line
cssLastLineOverwrite.description: Replace CSS styles for the class %s

thumbnail.label: Thumbnail
thumbnail.description: The first image is used as the preview image

thumbnailSize.label: Thumbnail size
thumbnailSize.description: Maximum width and height of the thumbnail

thumbnailSquare.label: Thumbnail Square
thumbnailSquare.description: Should the preview image be displayed squared

layout.label: Layout
layout.description: Which layout should be used for the preview

fileLogLevel.label: Log level
fileLogLevel.description: Log level for the log file %s

todoDueColorOpen.label: Color ToDo open
todoDueColorOpen.description: HTML font color for the ToDo date if the task is not completed

todoDueNearHours.label: Hours ToDo near due
todoDueNearHours.description: How many hours before the ToDo date should this be treated as close to the ToDo date

todoDueColorNear.label: Color ToDo near due date
todoDueColorNear.description: HTML font color for the ToDo date, if this is close to the ToDo date

todoDueColorOverdue.label: Color ToDo over due
todoDueColorOverdue.description: HTML font color for the ToDo date if the date for the task is overdue

todoDueColorDone.label: Color ToDo done
todoDueColorDone.description: HTML font color for the ToDo date when the task is completed

confidentialTags.label: Confidential tags
confidentialTags.description: Comma separated list of tags which will be used to define a note as confidential

fileCacheDays.label: Cache lifetime
fileCacheDays.description: Thumbnails in the cache that have not been displayed for more than x days are deleted at startup

msg.settingsChanged: Settings have been changed for the %s Plugin, please restart Joplin
